summary: A collection of unit tests for the text‑to‑speech preprocessing pipeline, covering audio trimming utilities, feature processing operations (scaling, log compression, mean‑variance and speaker normalization), and feature extraction/segmentation logic for energy, mel‑spectrogram, and pitch.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of preprocessing components that prepare raw audio and acoustic features for downstream TTS models, ensuring accurate speech segment detection, proper feature scaling/normalization, and reliable feature extraction.
